ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8.8 ounce) package UNCLE BEN'S® Ready Rice® Long Grain & Wild
½ cup reduced-sodium black beans, rinsed and drained
½ cup frozen sweet corn, thawed
½ cup mild salsa, plus more for serving if desired

cookingTips: Use pre-cooked rice to speed preparation; reheat gently to warm through
Layer ingredients evenly between tortillas for balanced filling distribution
Cook quesadillas over medium heat, pressing gently with spatula for even browning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: These quick quesadillas use convenience ingredients with nutritious wild rice. How will you balance flavors and ensure even melting of the cheese?
